description.ko: 엽록소의 맥을 통해 데이터가 흐르고 광섬유가 꽃처럼 피어나는 디지털 정원을 표현했습니다.
description.en: A representation of a digital garden where data flows through veins of chlorophyll and fiber optics bloom like flowers.

prompt: A hyper-macro cinematic shot of FLORA-9, a digital orchid where #89CFF0 fiber-optic petals pulse with liquid data. The stem is composed of #50C878 emerald circuit boards, set against a dark #4A0E4E velvet void. Glowing #FFB6C1 fractal pollen floats in a soft-focus bokeh of falling binary code. Iridescent liquid mercury droplets cling to the leaves. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, nature reclaiming technology.
